name: Zork game
body:
Zork is one of the earliest interactive fiction computer games, with roots drawn from the original genre game, Colossal Cave Adventure. The first version of Zork was written in 1977â€“1979 using the MDL programming language on a DEC PDP-10 computer. You can play it [here.](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5zyoqrsugeopel3ffhz_vq/zork)

After 40 years, and as a programming project it comes my version of the original game, with some new features as well as the main things that made this game a succes.


![The game map](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/64ea86f4c3a21e485485082e22ed211009b153c2/687474703a2f2f6936362e74696e797069632e636f6d2f32643939756f6a2e706e67)
Game map
